009package Ch11_CirclesAndEllipses;
010
011import ij.IJ;
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
014import ij.gui.Overlay;
015import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
016import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
017import imagingbook.common.color.sets.BasicAwtColor;
018import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
019import imagingbook.common.geometry.circle.GeometricCircle;
020import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic.CircleFitAlgebraic;
021import imagingbook.common.geometry.fitting.circle.algebraic.CircleFitAlgebraic.FitType;
022import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
023import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
024import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
025
026/**
027 * ImageJ plugin, collects all non-zero pixels (at least 3) in the current image
028 * and performs an algebraic circle fit on their coordinates. 
029 * The algebraic circle fit method can be selected.
030 * 
031 * @author WB
032 * @version 2022/09/30
033 */
034public class Circle_Fit_Algebraic_Image implements PlugInFilter {
035        
036        public static boolean ShowLog = true;
037        public static CircleFitAlgebraic.FitType algType = FitType.Pratt;
038        public static boolean ShowFittedCircle = true;
039        public static BasicAwtColor CircleColor = BasicAwtColor.Red;
040        public static double StrokeWidth = 1.0;
041        
042        private ImagePlus im;
043        
044        @Override
045        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
046                this.im = im;
047                return DOES_ALL;
048        }
049
050        @Override
051        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
052                
053                if (!runDialog()) {
054                        return;
055                }
056                
057                Pnt2d[] points = IjUtils.collectNonzeroPoints(ip);
058                if (ShowLog) {
059                        IJ.log("Found points " + points.length);
060                }
061                
062                if (points.length < 3) {
063                        IJ.error("At least 3 points are required, found only " + points.length);
064                        return;
065                }
066                
067                // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
068                CircleFitAlgebraic fitter = CircleFitAlgebraic.getFit(algType, points);
069                // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
070                
071                GeometricCircle fitCircle = fitter.getGeometricCircle();
072                if (fitCircle == null) {
073                        IJ.log("Algebraic fit failed!");
074                        return;
075                }
076                
077                if (ShowLog) {
078                        IJ.log("  fit: " + fitCircle);
079                }
080                
081//              IJ.log(String.format(Locale.US, "  error real = %.3f", realCircle.getMeanSquareError(points)));
082//              IJ.log(String.format(Locale.US, "  error fit  = %.3f", fitCircle.getMeanSquareError(points)));
083
084
085                // ----- draw fitted circle ----------------------------------
086                if (ShowFittedCircle) {
087                        Overlay oly = im.getOverlay();
088                        if (oly == null) {
089                                oly = new Overlay();
090                                im.setOverlay(oly);
091                        }
092                        ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter(oly);
093                        ColoredStroke outerStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, CircleColor.getColor());
094                        ola.addShapes(fitCircle.getShapes(3), outerStroke);
095                }
096                
097                im.show();
098        }
099
100        
101        // ------------------------------------------
102        
103        private boolean runDialog() {
104                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
105                gd.addEnumChoice("fit method", algType);
106                gd.addCheckbox("show fitted circle", ShowFittedCircle);
107                gd.addEnumChoice("circle color", CircleColor);
108                
109                gd.showDialog();
110                if (gd.wasCanceled())
111                        return false;
112                
113                algType = gd.getNextEnumChoice(CircleFitAlgebraic.FitType.class);
114                ShowFittedCircle = gd.getNextBoolean();
115                CircleColor = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
116                
117                return true;
118        }
119        
120}
